<OLD - In the Jungle>

all sorts could be

ees, or the

For those

ife

undantly clear to cybertronians almost immediately. All

peared to be out. All tracking beacons, com-links and

<NEW - WHEELIE>

In the jungle, the lion sleeps tonight.  And y=
et here Wheelie was, on full alert.  Slogging his way through the underbrus=
h quietly.  Knowing that he was being stalked, but having higher priorities=
 on his mind.

Sensing the hum, not with his sensors, but over with his spa=
rk now as he was being stalked.  At this point, quietly going over to take =
out a few energon rations to ready over for whatever he was thinking of, aw=
are of the signature moving along after him.

The jungle had a life and a v=
ibe of it's own.  Of the plants, the animals,t he moisture.  THe alien robo=
ts did not belong,a nd were not wanted here.

<OLD - JUNGLE>

> 
> The trek=
 that WHEELIE is on has brought him out into more open areas

e. The canopy of trees has grown unusually thick meaning
> that the underbr=
ush has died back, leaving the floor of the jungle,
> while uneven, relativ=
ely clear of plant life. The area is dark, but
> not overly so, much like a=
 day in the open as the sun was setting, or

ouds.

ved

rough the area. The bark had been knocked off or actual dents or

e in the trees themselves.

ws but strangely enough

sensors.

<NEW - WHEELIE>

At this point, noticing where the optics wer=
e coming from, WHEELIE turned over to face them, casually chiming, "Friends=
 find, look behind."  And then taking out his energon goodies over to hold =
them up in his hand, "Bah weep graaagnah wheep ni ni bong.  It's the univer=
sal greeting, or so they say.  Why don't you come out now and play?"

The g=
oodies held in his off hand, as if offering.  So his plan was if the entity=
 was friendly, it would see the goodies and hopefullyb e relaxed by them. A=
 nd if it was threatening or moved in to attack, then he could use his main=
 hand to whip out his slingshot to use the goodies for an extra 'burst' of =
ammo to shoot over at it for an added punch to get himself room to fight!

=
"Why don';t you come out to play?  We can have some fun this way!"
